fixed_xml: <ITEM>4. Bey Hrn. Scholer auf der Rheinbruck, ist zu haben: <BIBL><TITLE>Eine Folio-Bibel</TITLE>, mit <AUTHOR>Merianischen</AUTHOR> Kupfern, <YEAR>1704</YEAR>.</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Scapule</AUTHOR>, <TITLE>Lexicon graco-latinum</TITLE>, <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>, <YEAR>1565</YEAR>.</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>D. Eralmi Roterodam</AUTHOR>, <TITLE>Adagiotum Opus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>, <YEAR>1526</YEAR>.</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Tschudi</AUTHOR>, <TITLE>Gallia Comata</TITLE>, <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>, <YEAR>1758</YEAR>.</BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Ursprung und Alterthum der Stadt Basel</TITLE>, in <VOLUME>40</VOLUME>.</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Castelli</AUTHOR>, <TITLE>Lexicon Medicum</TITLE>, <FORMAT>graeco-latinum</FORMAT>, <VOLUME>46</VOLUME>, <YEAR>1746</YEAR>.</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Suiceri</AUTHOR>, <TITLE>Lexicon graco-latinum</TITLE>, <VOLUME>48</VOLUME>, <YEAR>1683</YEAR>.</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Limborch</AUTHOR>, <TITLE>de veritate Religionis christiana</TITLE>.</BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Oberrheinische Manigfaltigkeiten</TITLE>, <VOLUME>erster Kahrgang, complet</VOLUME>.</BIBL></ITEM>
explanation: The XML was missing some commas to separate the elements within the <BIBL> tags. In XML, elements should be separated by commas to indicate they are distinct entities.
